title: 287. Hoopers! Hoopers! Hoopers!
description: As CEO of Microsoft, Steve Ballmer was famous for over-the-top enthusiasm. Now he's brought that same passion to the N.B.A. -- and to a pet project called USAFacts, which performs a sort of fiscal colonoscopy on the American government.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
